title: Science Simulation Project for Enhancing Creative Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific theories and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Practical education focused on developing creative instructional design capabilities applicable to real-world settings, utilizing smartphone-based VR/simulation tools

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more creative simulation scenarios to effectively convey scientific concepts.
Learners can implement two or more interactive elements of VR-based educational content in a constrained technological environment (smartphone).
Learners can develop innovative instructional designs to solve existing science education issues through an interdisciplinary approach and revise them twice or more based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
